main event: A white light was observed gradually fading out with the advent of daylight on January 3, 1955 in Williamsburg, Virginia.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 1 hour and 30 minutes.
The sighting was reported by both military and civilian sources.
The object was described as a white light.
The report suggests the object could be an astronomical phenomenon such as a star or planet.
The conclusion of the report is that the sighting was possibly astronomical in nature.
